title: The richest people in America as of 2019
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
The lowest value at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) is 5.87x times less than the highest value at Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com).
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars 131.0 is found at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and the minimum is found at Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) where Month is 22.3.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
The highest Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has 108.7 more Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
Net worth in billion U.S. dollars at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) is 131.0 , second place is  at 131.0, and thirdly is Warren Buffett (Berkshire Hathaway) at 82.5.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars has reduced over the past 20 Months.
Month Charles Koch (Koch Industries), and David Koch (Koch Industries) have the same Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) has 2.52 times less Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than average.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 1039.3 if we add up values of all Months.
